name: 海洋生態系
comment: 本課程均在中研院新溫室大樓101教室上課
description:
Course Description: 
a. Ocean is composed of diversity of ecosystems ranging from shallow mudflat to deepsea trench. 
b. The interaction among physical, chemical, and biological characteristics of ocean determines the function and connection of different ecosystems.
c. Impact of environmental changes on marine ecosystem is tremendous and needed to have a further elucidation.
goals: a. review the current research information on different marine ecosystems, particularly on the biodiversity aspect.
b. introduce the new techniques in studying marine ecosystems
c. assist students to develop the research direction
syllabus:
Week 1 Overview of marine ecosystems

Week 2 Marine ecosystem-Chemical parameters 1

Week 3 Marine ecosystem-Chemical parameters 2

Week 4 Marine ecosystem-Physical parameters

Week 5 Biological Oceanography

Week 6 Biological Oceanography

Week 7 Biological Oceanography

Week 8 mid-term report

Week 9 Intertidal and Benthic Ecosystem

Week 10 Intertidal and Benthic Ecosystem

Week 11 Intertidal and Benthic Ecosystem

Week 12 Coral Reef Ecosystem

Week 13 Coral Reef Ecosystem

Week 14 Coral Reef Ecosystem

Week 15 Deepsea Ecosystem

Week 16 Deepsea Ecosystem

Week 17 General discussion

Week 18 Final mini-symposium on marine ecosystem
